description: A massive garbage dump on the outskirts of Goa Kingdom where unwanted items and people are discarded. Home to the kingdom's poorest residents.

keyEvents.title: Brothers Search Gray Terminal
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Ace, and Sabo arrive at Gray Terminal to search for materials to rebuild their hideout.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the episode's central conflict as the brothers unknowingly walk into a trap.

keyEvents.title: Sabo Captured at Gray Terminal
keyEvents.description: The Bluejam Pirates ambush and capture Sabo, Ace, and Luffy at Gray Terminal.
keyEvents.significance: Gray Terminal becomes the site of Sabo's capture and forced separation from his brothers.

keyEvents.title: Gray Terminal Fire Plot Revealed
keyEvents.description: Sabo learns that the nobles plan to burn Gray Terminal and all its inhabitants to prepare for a World Noble's visit.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the nobles' genocidal plan and Gray Terminal's fate, establishing the location's tragic importance.

statusHistory.reason: Gray Terminal exists as the Goa Kingdom's trash dump
Burned down by the nobles and Bluejam Pirates

description: The mansion of the Outlook noble family in High Town, Goa Kingdom. A symbol of wealth and privilege in stark contrast to Gray Terminal.

keyEvents.title: Sabo Meets Sterry
keyEvents.description: Sabo is brought back to the Outlook Mansion where he meets his adopted brother Sterry for the first time.
keyEvents.significance: The mansion represents Sabo's imprisonment and the oppressive noble life he despises.

keyEvents.title: Fire Plot Revealed at Mansion
keyEvents.description: Within the Outlook Mansion, Sabo learns about the nobles' plan to burn Gray Terminal from Sterry.
keyEvents.significance: The mansion becomes the place where Sabo discovers the horrifying truth about the nobles' genocidal plan.

keyEvents.title: Sabo Escapes the Mansion
keyEvents.description: Sabo escapes from the Outlook Mansion to warn Ace and Luffy about the fire.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Sabo's rejection of noble life and his determination to save his brothers.

statusHistory.reason: The Outlook family mansion remains standing in High Town

description: The wealthy district of Goa Kingdom where nobles live in luxury, completely separated from the poverty of Gray Terminal by massive walls.

keyEvents.title: Sabo Flees Through High Town
keyEvents.description: Sabo runs through High Town to escape and warn his brothers about the Gray Terminal fire.
keyEvents.significance: Represents the barrier between Sabo's forced noble life and his true bonds with his brothers.

statusHistory.reason: High Town continues to exist as the noble district of Goa Kingdom

name.japanese: ブルージャム海賊団のアジト

description: The hideout of the Bluejam Pirates, located in or near Gray Terminal.

keyEvents.title: Ace and Luffy at Bluejam's Hideout
keyEvents.description: After being captured, Ace and Luffy are taken to Bluejam's hideout where they are offered positions on his crew.
keyEvents.significance: Shows how the Bluejam Pirates manipulate the brothers into helping with the nobles' fire plot.

statusHistory.reason: The Bluejam Pirates' hideout is operational
Likely destroyed in the Gray Terminal fire
